div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

Hello! My name is {name}. I live in Belguim during 3 years. My life in 10 years will be so interesting. I study French and English. I have got an experience working comme a lawer in Russia. I have une daugther 6 months. I hope to have more children. I love some much children.

In 10 years I will going to work. Find a job is my purpose studing English. I like active life and I will travel a lot around the world with my family. I would like discover countries where I've never been. It's amasing to see the type of life which is different. At the same time I woulde like to do something to creat cosiness at home. My house will be very beautefull and cosy. They will be many flowers in the garden. To do a career also is very important for living and to be positive in the life.
